website_summaries.verdict: These bands expand and contract around your muscle without restricting movement, all while maintaining optimal pressure.
pros: Material expands and contracts around muscle without restricting movement
Fits in the crux between deltoid and bicep/tricep without restricting movement

customer_reviews.title: This brand is not quite as effective as the Delphi unit but it is FAR and AWAY the best of the low cost straps I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different brands and types of straps/wraps for use with BFR training and none ever got close to the effect of the personalized tourniquet systems (specifically the one Delphi manufactures). This brand is not quite as effective as the Delphi unit but it is FAR and AWAY the best of the low cost straps I have tried. Yes, they are a tad more expensive than some of the other brands but they are also much more effective and easily worth the difference in price. If you have any interest in BFR training I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Saintsfan29

customer_reviews.title: I bought the arm and leg bands i enjoy the leg ones but not the arm ones because ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the arm and leg bands i enjoy the leg ones but not the arm ones because of the buckle on it its not easy to tighten nor is it easy to release it quickly and the buckle pushes against your arm it's fairly uncomfortable the leg ones however are full Velcro they tighten easily and released quickly I don't understand why they didn't just do this with the arm ones any way if you can get past the buckle thing its good Quality for sure
customer_reviews.author: Alexis C LaCentra

customer_reviews.title: These are the BFR/Occlusion bands to BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these bands for about a week now (I ordered both the arm and leg bands) right out of the box the quality of material and design was obvious. Perhaps what separates these cuffs from the others is the design that lets you tighten the cuffs (particularly the arm cuffs) with one hand. I've had lots of nods and numerous questions at the gym and the general consensus is that these cuffs are way better and easier to use than "knee wraps". Lastly, I had a couple of questions about the straps and sent a quick email to customer service. Their response was fast and thorough. I was super impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Dilliard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bands perfect width for arms not too thick, After first workout i was sore for 3 days, amazing, I felt my arms full pumped. You just have to check your ego at the door and lift lighter weights with intensity, 30 second break between sets,Also check your radial (wrist) pulse to make sure bands are not too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The metal clamp can pinch your skin if you aren't ...
customer_reviews.text: The metal clamp can pinch your skin if you aren't careful, also one already slips when tight so I have to tuck under and do a 1/2 tie to keep it secure.
customer_reviews.author: charles terrill

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy for arms
customer_reviews.text: The metal clip hurts even after following the directions of not having it tight or snug on my arm. Ended up getting bruises on both arms and wish I would have returned it sooner as I missed the timeframe. Instead, buy Lifting Lab's Ultimate Leg Straps for your arms, a ton more comfortable and I love those. I'm in the gym 5 days a week and it works well for arms.
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: I love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!! I'm a serious lifter. Takes a lot for me to get sore in my arms. Did arms in the morning and was sore all night. Didn't even take 24hrs for DOMS to kick in. Excellent customer service, Contacted me directly with concerns I was having. I would recommend these for anyone addicted to the pump! The band are high quality bands, doesn't get loose or shift around. I like the little bag that they come in too.
customer_reviews.author: Danielr178st

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: i like the bands and have seen results. The locking mechanism to hold the tighened band in place slip. There should be a belt buckle type lock to keep it in place
customer_reviews.author: anthony parisi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product product.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other bands of this type, with decent results.....I ordered these, put them to use immediately ......I found them to be comfortable and easy to put on and remove. They are well made and should be durable. I am very pleased with these bands.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool to Help Your Arms Feel More Pumped
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight and easy to strap on. Once you get the hang of how tight they need to be for you, you should start noticing changes - with consistent workouts - in your arms after a few weeks. Be careful not to tighten them too much or you'll feel more numbness than a pump. Helped me break my plateau!
customer_reviews.author: Saad Qureshi

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my BFR/occlusion training
customer_reviews.text: These cuffs are functioning really well for me so far. Instead of fumbling with wrapping my arms with bands (and getting the tightness wrong and having to re-wrap it), I can easily just slip my arms into these cuffs and simply adjust the tightness using the buckle. No hassle.
customer_reviews.author: T.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package, and little bits of the disintegrating strap fell out. Dead on arrival as the retaining strap fell right off.
customer_reviews.author: WillTheThrill

customer_reviews.title: I've been doing occlusion training for a while with cheaper bands and had gotten pretty decent results
customer_reviews.text: HOLY MOTHER OF MERCY!!!!!!... I've been doing occlusion training for a while with cheaper bands and had gotten pretty decent results...but I put these on and did My circuit the day after I got them and....oh My God!!!, if there were more than five stars I'd give Em!, This the most epic pump and workout I've gotten, hands down, EVER!, I swear I've literally put inches on My arms and Shoulders in just the bit that I've used them... AWESOME PRODUCT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Large Clasps
customer_reviews.text: Just an FYI that the clasps on these are kind of large and the leftover tails after securing them don't really have anywhere secure to go so they just kind of hang there. If only I had bigger arms I wouldn't have the hanging tail issue, but alas...
customer_reviews.author: jameseattle

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I don’t even have to write a review just Che knout my instagram page and you’ll see the results and you judge how great this product is. @muscle_and_gains
customer_reviews.author: Domani F.

customer_reviews.title: I saw some good arm pump with these bands
customer_reviews.text: I saw some good arm pump with these bands. The straps feel good against my skin no rough material. My only complaint is that I did receive a guide but it cool figured it out by doing some research. Good company and package was shipped in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: The Gamer King

customer_reviews.title: Good straps, minus the obnoxious rubber tab.
customer_reviews.text: Work well, but the first thing i did is cut off the big rubber piece. I'd rather have a short piece of strap sticking out than a big rubber tab to tuck into a little loop.
customer_reviews.author: Sharp Dressed

customer_reviews.title: Good product to invest in
customer_reviews.text: Great product, before buying these I did my homework in BFR training at first it was a little awkward but man when you get the hang of it one can get some really good pump out of these things. Great for people that are preping and are looking to just increase volume and get great pumps. The manual that this came with was pretty helpful too. Good product to invest in.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Araujo

customer_reviews.title: Jay G.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ease of use! I love the fact that it has metal buckles to tighten the strap as opposed to Velcro which can and will weaken over time. Just be careful not to tighten so quickly that the buckle may pinch your skin. Overall 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jay G.

customer_reviews.title: ... Bands I’ve tried and they are hands down the best by far
customer_reviews.text: These were th fourth brand of BFR Bands I’ve tried and they are hands down the best by far. The bands and clasp are more durable, and they are easier to put on and set to the higher tensions needed for effective BFR training. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Rxoxo

customer_reviews.title: Overrated
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the items seems to be cheap, doesn't fit very well in your arm. Overrated, you can see the images
customer_reviews.author: Hercules

customer_reviews.title: ... was using disposable tourniquets for arm work which worked fine and were easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Prior to buying these bands I was using disposable tourniquets for arm work which worked fine and were easy to put on. The down side to them was that they didn't last long, and weren't effective at restricting blood flow for calf work. These bands work great, although a bit awkward to tighten on the upper arm. But certainly not a big deal. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome straps! Do exactly what I need them to do and no pinching the skin when putting them on. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Well made, tight but not uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Definitely, adds pain to your arms work. These straps are easy to adjust and they are well made. They have a good balance of elasticity and tightness.
customer_reviews.author: FitOne

customer_reviews.title: Insta-Guns
customer_reviews.text: Best pump of my life. I was a little afraid my arms would explode. They got very red and engorged but, based on everything I've read on BFR training, this is normal. Enjoy! Get huge.
customer_reviews.author: marquis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend and well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and taking my training to the next level. I could not believe the results after 1 week of including BFR training into my workout. Well worth the investment and your muscles and joints will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Occlusion Gear!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic budget occlusion gear - once you figure out how to secure them with one hand.... Would rate 3.5, but no halves. Good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Malygaro

customer_reviews.title: Service service service!
customer_reviews.text: Product works as expected. I did have an issue and I must say that it was handled both expeditiously, and well beyond any expectations I may have had. In the future when I'm looking for gear, this company will be my first stop. With the service they have provided, they have earned that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These need to be in every sports player's and exercise guru's gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Moore

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great but it can be difficult to find your 'spot'
customer_reviews.author: J. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Simple design, easy to use, cuts circulation like its supposed to! Taking my workouts to the next level with this!
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Goronart

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrific, you can feel your blood bulging until you release the strap. Great pump way after your workout.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Solid well made product. Heavy duty. I had others and it sucks compared to this.
customer_reviews.author: Tri Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Need e book as purchased with product
customer_reviews.text: No information on how to use ? Ebook not sent yet
customer_reviews.author: Dr Jim

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I got it and immediately tried it out, it's comfortable and stays fasten, however I'm still hesitant about the proper way to use.
customer_reviews.author: Osvaldo P.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who is a serious weight lifter. He loves them and says they have made a big difference in his workout.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Felton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These bands are amazing... Easy to use, extremely comfortable even at the tightest settings, and great quality...
customer_reviews.author: JustD

customer_reviews.title: ... the bands not slip but after figuring it out great product that gives an insane pump
customer_reviews.text: Took a minute to get the buckles to work properly and have the bands not slip but after figuring it out great product that gives an insane pump. Looking forward to using for many workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great arm bands, really fast pump, and the latches hold securely. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: ricky

customer_reviews.title: This is the best band out there and I have tried them all
customer_reviews.text: This is the best band out there and I have tried them all. It's easy to put on and adjust easily . I also get an incredible pump every needs to try this product,
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Next level pump!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pump ! Arms measure 23" . Intense work out, immediate training effect , and lasting engorgement of tissue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Want to finally start making gains?
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent, easy to adjust and doesn't loosen up while doing a set, as some other bands have done on me. Would recommend to anyone who is serious about building some muscle. Stephen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Their very easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: Their very easy on and off. Works great, the elastic strap is firm but allows for some movement. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L.

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend but wear on top of clothes
customer_reviews.text: don’t like the buckle, begins to hurt and when you get the pump it’s a good pump but the buckle doesn’t work well with a good pump
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Botros

customer_reviews.title: Much like the SUPERIOR leg Occlusion bands from lifting lab these ...
customer_reviews.text: Much like the SUPERIOR leg Occlusion bands from lifting lab these were exactly what I was looking for. It takes a little adjusting to find the right pressure but once you figure that part out they are amazing Occlusion bands!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Poor stitching on the excess strap holder. One broke the 1st day I used them. The other one is now starting to fray and will soon break and I've only used these a few times. Disappointed with the quality for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: These bands and a solid work plan helped me
customer_reviews.text: These worked for me, I would not go to the gym with out them.
customer_reviews.author: F Edelman

customer_reviews.title: Highest Quality in an Occlusion Band...Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I already own a decent pair of occlusion cuffs, but saw these and figured since they were a little less wide and more flexible fabric they'd be worth a shot. I haven't used them yet but did test fit them several times, and they feel very good. Easy to adjust and take off with one hand, the metal buckles are very high quality. The fabric itself is quite thick and of high quality. I will run them through their real paces later this week, but the quality here is the highest I've seen in an occlusion band yet. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Renesis79

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are are awesome! The material is comfortable and flexes with your movements. Plus the free guide really helps to understand how to use them and why they work.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was working great until the small strap part broke.. Now it's a bit of a nuisance to use
customer_reviews.author: gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great product! The design effectively occludes but does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The design effectively occludes but does not pinch. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking to implement occlusion training into their workout regime.
customer_reviews.author: John-Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best BFR bands!
customer_reviews.text: I have the lower body BFR from the Lifting Labs and absolutely love them. Once I found out that there were making upper body bicep/tricep bands. I was excited and couldn't wait to get them. Once they were available, I purchased them the same day. They arrived quickly and I also go a nice guide on how to use both upper and lower body bands. The bands themselves look very well made with an iron buckle and the fabric is soft and flexible, but very strong. Here is a video I made with them on my instagram page @padilla_personal_training
customer_reviews.author: RODRIGO PADILLA

customer_reviews.title: straps work as advertised. 1 of the buckles doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: straps work as advertised. 1 of the buckles doesn't lock down w/o prying up on the back of the buckle. Could also use some fabric under the buckle to pad it. Not major issues.
customer_reviews.author: Delbert & Connie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It never came with the guide book that it said it came with .i got it today.
customer_reviews.author: Frank James Willet

customer_reviews.title: Love my new arm bands from lifting labs
customer_reviews.text: Love my new arm bands from lifting labs, one band had a problem with the buckle, customer service was awesome and had a new band to me in days. Great product, great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: WRM

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Material is strong and flexible and the metal brackets feel like they will hold up for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jettman333

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!! I'm about to order the leg bands!!! I've tried a few other brands at the gym and these are by far the best!! Top quality!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bands
customer_reviews.text: What a great pump I get when using these bands! I will have to see how much more bicep/tricep size that I can attribute to using these bands vs. just regular curls and tricep extensions without them. Since I just received them, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Best you can get
customer_reviews.text: Best BFR bands on the market and I've tried all types!!!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER ABBAS

product_meta.title: Lifting Lab | Flexible Arm Bands for Practical BFR Training, Blood Flow Restriction Training, Occlusion Bands (Pair)
feature_bullets: Best bands on Amazon for practical BFR Training
30 day money back guarantee if they're not your thing
1 year warranty (we have great customer support if you need it)
Free starter guide that shows you how to safely put BFR bands on and use them
Comfortable and easy to put on any arm size
